solution_line_template: On Monday, Mrs. Watson grades {total_exams} x {monday_grade_percent_num}% = <<{total_exams}*{monday_grade_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={monday_graded_exams}>>{monday_graded_exams} final exams.
At the end of Monday, she has {total_exams} - {monday_graded_exams} = <<{total_exams}-{monday_graded_exams}={remaining_exams_after_monday}>>{remaining_exams_after_monday} exams left to grade.

On Tuesday, she grades {remaining_exams_after_monday} x {tuesday_grade_percent_num}% = <<{remaining_exams_after_monday}*{tuesday_grade_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={tuesday_graded_exams}>>{tuesday_graded_exams} final exams.

On Wednesday, she has {remaining_exams_after_monday} - {tuesday_graded_exams} = <<{remaining_exams_after_monday}-{tuesday_graded_exams}={wednesday_remaining_exams}>>{wednesday_remaining_exams} exams left to grade.
